title: (x) Full Circle logo - Percolator {Mike Y}
content:
Hi there, does anyone know what font this might be? The ’e’ is a big clue, but I’ve never seen the it before...any ideas?

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [full\_circle.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135336/http:/typophile.com/files/full_circle.jpg) | 24.47 KB |

 [‹ (x) Zaid Shlah "Taqsim" book cover serif - Adobe Jenson {Eric B, Lari}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135336/http:/typophile.com/node/29466 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Agency Sacks logo on website - ITC Mixage {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135336/http:/typophile.com/node/29441 "Go to next forum topic")
author: heners

comments.content:
I think this is Percolator from Lunchbox fonts.

- Mike Yanega

It looks like [T-26](http://web.archive.org/web/20071208135336/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/percolator/) is selling it these days. Adam Roe is the designer. (The old Creative Alliance catalog showed ’Lunchbox’ as the foundry).

- Mike Yanega
Hay, that’s the one. Thank you very much.
